description: Frank Lloyd Wright designed this desk and armchair as part of his plan for the offices of the S.C. Johnson company. Their curved forms and earth tones echo the project's architectural designs. Wright—renowned for integrating the exterior and interior—furnished designs based on principles of nature and often resisted changes to his designs. This three-legged chair, however, proved unsteady, and he altered later versions to have four feet.
artist_info:
Designed by Frank Lloyd Wright (American
1867–1959)
Metal Office Furniture Company (now Steelcase, Inc., American, founded 1912)
Grand Rapids, Michigan
title: Armchair
